data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Thanks to scientific advances, it is becoming easier to trace one's genealogy. By ____ genetic ____, ____ is ____ to ____ the ____ or ____ of a genetic ____. Researchers ____ look ____ genetic ____ to ____ this ____. This analytic approach exists in tandem with more traditional methods of search.
data.partBlankContent: Thanks to scientific advances, it is becoming easier to trace one's genealogy. By invest_______ genetic simila______, i_ is poss____ to dete_____ the sou___ or ori___ of a genetic li__. Researchers of___ look a_ genetic mar____ to dete_____ this simil_____. This analytic approach exists in tandem with more traditional methods of search.
data.answer: 由于科学的进步，追查一个人的家谱变得越来越容易。通过研究遗传相似性，就有可能确定遗传生命的来源或起源。研究人员经常通过观察遗传边缘来确定这种相似性。这种分析方法与更传统的搜索方法是同时存在的。
